import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { TaskService } from 'src/services/task.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-new-task', templateUrl: './create-new-task.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-new-task.component.css'], }) export class CreateNewTaskComponent { constructor(private taskService: TaskService, private router: Router) {} onSubmit(form: NgForm) { if (form.valid) { const task = { id: form.value.title, startTime: form.value.startDate, endTime: form.value.endDate, duration: form.value.duration, // repeat: form.value.repeat }; console.log(task); this.taskService.createTask(task).subscribe({ next: (response) => console.log('Task created', response), error: (err) => console.error('Error creating task', err.message), }); } } } Create New Task

Create New Task
